::Fidgit::
WHile she was running after Beachcomber, she heard the automated systems 
kick on and she heard over the loud speakers-INTRUDER ALERT-INTRUDER 
ALERT-INTRUDER ALERT-
"Holy Cybertron,  how did someone get into the base?"
She yelled after Beachcomber, "HEY, WE GOT COMPANY INSIDE THE SHIP!"


-----------Original Message--------
From:   <JP3884@a...>
Date: Fri Jun 23, 2000 6:37pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


::: Black Aracnia began to advance, followed by Inferno and the large
Rampage. :::

::: Black Aracnia ::: Now, I need to get to the computer core....you two
cover me.

::: Inferno pushes past her ::: The Royalty would have assigned me with any
important task, you-

::: Black Aracnia slugged him ::: Im the brains of this mission, you two are
the brawn! Now cover me!

::: The three Predacons run down the well lit, and warm, yet smoky corridor.
Black Aracnia was searching for the computer core, and she wasnt getting
anywhere fast. :::

::: Black Aracnia ::: Damn it, I wish I had a map of this pace!

::: Inferno ::: The Maximals will Burn!

::: Rampage ::: Dont you ever get tired of saying that?

::: Inferno ::: Silence X, we must find the computer core!
